title: FS/FT: T205 Wallace One Line SGC 4 - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T205 Wallace One Line SGC 4 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD

Wallace no cap with 1 line of 1910 stats.  Graded SGC 4. Nice new holder.

Looking to move this toughie.  Card looks great in hand.

Asking $1975 obo. Will consider trades for bigger PSA graded T206’s just let me know what you have.

Thanks for looking!

Jeff
